metadata.title: CVE-2016-4434 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache Tika before 1.13 does not properly initialize the XML parser orchoose handlers, which might allow remote attackers to conduct XML ExternalEntity (XXE) attacks via vectors involving (1) spreadsheets in OOXML filesand (2) XMP metadata in PDF and other file formats, a related issue toCVE-2016-2175.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtika-java - 1.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tika package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.18-1').
